jobDescription: Data Analyst - Permanent Role - Austin, TX  Our client is searching for a Data Analyst with the ability to lead the data mapping, reporting and documentation. We are looking for a hands-on analytics professional with experience in engaging with businesses to identify strategic goals, driving design of high impact data solutions and database systems. As a career opportunity, this an ideal environment for a Data Analyst with technical experience to grow within a determined culture.  Responsibilities: Develop internal tracking and reporting for data usage in databasesCreate tools and modify procedures to improve efficiency and accuracyWork with key stakeholders, internal users, and developers to define and discuss business intelligence needsBuild database tables for database maintenance and reporting Required Skills: 3+ year as a Data AnalystStrong understanding of database design, database development and analyzing dataKnowledge of Transact-SQL, Excel, and AccessBachelor's Degree in Information Systems Management, Accounting or Computer Science Desired Skills: Prior Experience in Financial Services industry
